name: $unlikely
desc: There is a high level of clinical certainty that the reaction was caused by the identified substance.

name: $likely
desc: There is a very high level of clinical certainty that the reaction was due to the identified substance, which may include clinical evidence by testing or rechallenge.

name: $confirmed
desc: The clinical certainty that the reaction was caused by the identified substance is unknown.  It is an explicit assertion that certainty is not known.
